1.title: The Cake Lady
1.plot: Theresa Stanton gets the surprise of a lifetime when Ky and Jenn act as true philanthropists as they pay it forward and encourage the local community of Frederick, Maryland to do the same.

imdb.plot outline: A documentary leaning hybrid series that highlights ordinary citizens with extraordinary talents and passions, and pairs them with local businesses and other community members; providing them with opportunities they never would have had if it hadn't knocked on their door. The show has a "buy local stay local" and "pay it forward" foundation. Participants/recipients featured in each segment are uniquely matched with a business(es) and members in their local communities for their "opportunity," which aligns with the purpose and/or mission of the community member or establishment.
